mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(title, content, useridx) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{useridx})
mapper.select: SELECT a.bno, a.title, a.content, a.regdate, a.moddate, b.nickname, b.userid FROM board a JOIN user b ON a.useridx = b.idx WHERE a.bno = #{bno}
SELECT a.bno, a.title, a.regdate, a.moddate, b.nickname, b.userid FROM board a JOIN user b ON a.useridx = b.idx WHERE a.bno > 0 ORDER BY a.bno DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT count(bno) FROM board WHERE bno>0
